title: Nanbane Enadhu Uyir Lyrics Sattam(1983)
stanzas:
Nanbane
Enadhu uyir nanbane
neenda naal uravidhu
indrupol endrume
thodarvadhu (2)

irandu kaigal
inaidhu valangum
iniya oasai
indrum endrum
kaetka vendum
enadhu aasai.

Nanbane
Enadhu uyir nanbane
neenda naal uravidhu
indrupol endrume
thodarvadhu (2)

yaarum unnai
sondham kondaal
idaiyil vandha
urimai endraal
adharkkaaga naan
vazhakkaaduven

yaarum unnai
thirudi chella
paarthu nirkkum
thozhan alla
unakkaaga naan
kaaval nirppen

Nanbane
Enadhu uyir nanbane
neenda naal uravidhu
indrupol endrume
thodarvadhu (2)
